summary: Seasoned grifter Dolly Crandall returns to the 'badger game' but has a change of heart when she falls in love with a young man she believes is a rich Southerner.
cast: Norma Shearer|Lowell Sherman|Gwen Lee|Johnny Mack Brown|Eugenie Besserer|Buddy Messinger|Charles K. French|Polly Moran|Walter Percival|Bert Roach|Adele Watson
keywords: ex convict|femme fatale|manipulative female|con artist|husband wife relationship
title: La chica de la suerte
